mapper.select: SELECT * FROM(SELECT * FROM (SELECT TRAINNAME, DEPPLACENAME, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(DEPPLANDTIME,9,4),'HH24mi'),'HH24"시"mi"분"') as depPlandTime, ARRPLACENAME, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(SUBSTR(ARRPLANDTIME,9,4),'HH24mi'),'HH24"시"mi"분"') as arrPlandTime, TAKETIME, ROW_NUMBER() OVER( ORDER BY DEPPLANDTIME ASC) AS RN FROM KTXINFO_TB WHERE DEPPLACENAME = #{ktxInfoVO.depPlaceName} AND ARRPLACENAME = #{ktxInfoVO.arrPlaceName} AND TO_DATE(SUBSTR(DEPPLANDTIME,1,10),'yyyymmddHH24') BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{ktxInfoVO.depPlandTime},'YYYYMMDDHH24') AND ROUND(TO_DATE(#{ktxInfoVO.depPlandTime},'YYYYMMDDHH24')+1)) WHERE RN>=#{pagingComponent.startPage} AND RN <= #{pagingComponent.endPage})

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM KTXINFO_TB WHERE DEPPLACENAME = #{depPlaceName} AND ARRPLACENAME = #{arrPlaceName} AND TO_DATE(SUBSTR(DEPPLANDTIME,1,10),'yyyymmddHH24') BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{depPlandTime},'YYYYMMDDHH24') AND ROUND(TO_DATE(#{depPlandTime},'YYYYMMDDHH24')+1)
